examples.korean: It seems such a waste to throw good food away. 발음듣기 좋은[멀쩡한] 음식을 버리는 것은 대단한 낭비인 것 같다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It seems such a waste to throw good food away. 발음

examples.korean: I hate to see good food go to waste. 발음듣기 나는 멀쩡한 음식이 낭비되는[버려지는] 것을 보는 게 싫다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I hate to see good food go to waste. 발음

examples.korean: His illness was a perfect fake. 발음듣기 병이라던 것은 멀쩡한 거짓말이었다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His illness was a perfect fake. 발음

examples.korean: He's treating a sane man as if he were crazy. 발음듣기 그는 멀쩡한 사람을 정신병자 취급한다 Neungyule
examples.english: He's treating a sane man as if he were crazy. 발음

examples.korean: Without the watch, I would’ve hurt my wrist too. 발음듣기 야, 그래도 이 시계 덕분에 손목이 멀쩡한 거야. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Without the watch, I would’ve hurt my wrist too. 발음
